name: iBoat Racer
description:
For more watery fun, try iFish Pond!

Speed over the waves and race for the finish line!

iBoat Racer is simple to play, but recreates an incredibly realistic boating experience.

Push the throttle to the max and kick up some spray!

FEATURES

** TILT CONTROL
Realistic boat steering physics gives the ultimate motorboating experience

** GAME CENTER ENABLED
Get the fastest time and brag to your friends

**SIXTEEN UNIQUE LEVELS
Each stage is hand-crafted to be exciting and puzzling.

**INCREDIBLE OCEAN SCENERY
You'll feel like you're actually racing across the open Pacific Ocean!

**UNMATCHED WATER SIMULATION
There are simply no realistic water-based racing games. This sets the bar high! Powered by OpenGL 2.0 and a state-of-the-art wave simulator.
